== Kothamangalam (M) (803292) ==

Kothamangalam (M) is a town in the [[Kothamangalam]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 40.04 sq. km. and harbouring 9663 households with total population of 38837 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 54 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 222 km. Male population is 19029 and female population is 19808. Scheduled Caste population is 2340 and Scheduled Tribes population is 125. Census Location Code of the town is 803292<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 54 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 54 km. Railway station is at Aluva at a distance of 35 km.
